resources.string: It is our vision to acquire property to have simple and functional buildings for worship, education, and ministry to the whole person.
It is our vision to be a place where people genuinely interact with God in dynamic corporate worship, and as a result, experience tangible life change.

It is our vision to be a truly loving church. We will demonstrate that we are true Followers of Christ by loving in deed both those who are a part of this fellowship and those who are outside of this fellowship in the community.
It is our vision to help people experience true-life change by growing towards spiritual maturity through preaching/teaching, small groups, classes, seminars, and retreats.
It is our vision to be a place where each person is equipped to serve others and be a reproducing spiritual leader.
It is our vision to be a church that gives birth to other churches.
It is our vision to be a church that sends out ministers all over the world.
It is our vision to be a church with an emphasis on building up families that equips couples to build godly marriages and raise their children according to biblical principles.
It is our vision to be a church that has top-notch youth and childrenâ€™s ministries.
